title: Exercise: Use the Resource File System

questions.question: Adding data to the FME Server Resources Data folder is the same as using a temporary upload when you publish a workspace.
To run a workspace using the Resources Data folder, you have to manually type in the path using the $(FME_SHAREDRESOURCE_DATA) notation.
Setting reader and writer path parameters to use $(FME_SHAREDRESOURCE_DATA) notation means that the workspace will use data from FME Server regardless of which user runs it.
